user.title: webIO Setup
user.description: Please enter IP and - if needed - your password for the webIO device.

inputs.title: Inputs
inputs.description:
Here you may enter the names of the inputs.
Without individual naming, a standard name will be set.

outputs.title: Outputs
outputs.description:
Here you may enter the names of the outputs.
Without individual naming, a standard name will be set.

error.cannot_connect: Error connection to webIO-device, please check IP address and/or password.
